text: – Nursery – Provision of bridges across the Lee Navigation Canal – Retention and improvement of existing open space z New bridge links should be provided across the Lee Navigation that align with the street pattern of Hackney Wick and Fish Island, in order to provide improved access to amenities, movement routes, and transport infrastructure for new residents. z This site could potentially be suitable for extra-care accommodation. BACK TO CONTENTS Form, massing, and heritage z Height Strategy: Appropriate height of 43m at the tallest point, which should be located in the northeastern part of the site. Heights should step down gradually towards the south of the site. z The impact of development on nearby conservation areas should
